raynor.name: Penetrating Round
raynor.ablity: Slow enemies in a line by 20% for 2 seconds
raynor.effect: Enemies close to Raynor are knocked back further.

raynor.name: Inspire
raynor.demage: Raynor and all nearby allied Minions and Mercenaries gain 30% Attack
raynor.ablity: Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds
raynor.effect: Casting Inspire resets Raynor's Basic Attack cooldown.

raynor.name: Adrenaline Rush
raynor.demage: Heal Raynor for 25% of his maximum Health over 1 second.
raynor.ablity: Raynor's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of this by 0.5 seconds

kerrigan.name: Ravage
kerrigan.demage: Leap at a target, dealing 130 damage.
kerrigan.ablity: If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds

kerrigan.name: Primal Grasp
kerrigan.ablity: After 2.5 seconds, an explosion occurs around Kerrigan

zeratul.name: Cleave
zeratul.ablity: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds
zeratul.effect: Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds

zeratul.name: Singularity Spike
zeratul.ablity: Slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds

zeratul.name: Might Of The Nerazim
zeratul.ablity: Activate to cast an untalented version
zeratul.effect: Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage
